map.intro: Use the arrow keys to move your#character to the exit on the other side.#............# Press Enter

map.intro: Terrific! Now let's try to clean the deck.#Use the Space key to plant a bomb.#............# Press Enter

map.intro: Stranded on the coast of a savage island,#equipped with nothing but an infinite amount#of lethal explosives, our hero starts on a# dangerous journey into the unknown ...
